- Written by [[JosephConrad]] while he was having writer's block with his other
projects
- Takes place in [[Africa]]
- Novela

## Publishing

- 1899 - published in a magazine
- 1902 - standalone book

## Setting

A  bunch of people are sitting in a boat and the story is told by an anonymous
narrarator who was listening to a story told by Marlo.

## Themes

- Morality
- Racism - who is truly uncivilised?
- Imperialism
- Colonialism
- Madness
- Hatred
- Darkness
- Evil
- Judgement
